entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update `It_warns_on_nonportable_rids` test once corresponding installer changes flow to sdk repo #33152
  • Add property for using the runtime identifier matching the source-built rid. #33138
  • #if MONOANDROID preprocessor is not available in .NET 7 project. #33136
  • Duplicate error code found #33133

Closed

  • Files created during dotnet publish fail when deployed to app service in azure #33105

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33160
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33159
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow using latest illink analyzer on netstandard projects #33158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for catching duplicate error codes #33155
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Default container image tags to latest instead of versions #33132
    Area-Containers

Merged

  • [Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized #33122
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix duplicate error code #33102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove DynamicCodeSupport default from SDK #33040
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Startup race condition #33007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable some F# tests #16020
    Area-FSharp

Updated

  • Don't add AOT package in restore for < net7 #31201
    Area-NativeAOT
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Standardize error messages #33084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
